Health and Safety (HS) User's Guide

Health and Safety Requirements

The following are HS subsystem requirements. Detailed requirements can be found in the Health and Safety Application Requirements Document.

CFS-510: The CFS shall monitor application execution and take the appropriate action if one or more critical applications fails to execute.
CFS-511: The CFS shall monitor all event messages, looking for critical events and taking the appropriate action.
CFS-512: The CFS shall maintain the watchdog timer.
CFS-513: The CFS shall monitor and report the CPU Aliveness.
